experiment_types.title: Experiment Types

description: Schema for submitting a computational analysis workflow that is composed of analysis step(s).
title: Workflow

experiment_types.comment: TODO: Update to `experiment_types.display_title` once becomes a linkTo
experiment_types.title: Experiment Type

___cwl_child_filenames.description: Names of the other CWL files used by the main CWL file for the workflow
___cwl_child_filenames.title: CWL child file names

___app_version.description: The version of the workflow app.
___app_version.title: App version

___title.description: The preferred viewable name of the workflow.
___title.title: Title

___workflow_language.description: Language used to describe workflow, either CWL or WDL
___workflow_language.title: Workflow language

___linkto_primaryfile.description: Primary file that is related to this argument. Applicable only for Input file and Output processed file that is not a primary file.
___linkto_primaryfile.title: Primary File

___is_primaryfile.description: Flag indicating whether the argument is a primary or secondary file. Not applicable for types other than Input file and Output processed file.
___is_primaryfile.title: Is Primary File

___qc_zipped_tables.description: Names or suffices of QC table files in the zipped file
___qc_zipped_tables.title: QC Zipped Tables

items.description: Name or suffix of QC table file in the zipped file
items.title: QC Datafile

___qc_json.description: Name of QC file if in .json format, either as it is or in the zipped file
___qc_json.title: QC Json

___qc_zipped_html.description: Name of QC html file in the zipped file
___qc_zipped_html.title: QC Zipped Html

___qc_html.description: Name of QC file if in .html format, either as it is or in the zipped file
___qc_html.title: QC Html

___qc_zipped.description: Name of QC file if in .zip format
___qc_zipped.title: QC Zipped

___alternative_conditional_argument_name.description: Alternative argument names, in case argument names may vary depending on condition
___alternative_conditional_argument_name.title: Alternative Conditional Argument Names

items.description: An alternative argument name, in case argument names may vary depending on condition
items.title: Alternative Conditional Argument Name

___argument_to_be_attached_to.description: Argument to be attached to, for qc files and input extra files
___argument_to_be_attached_to.title: Argument To Be Attached To

___workflow_argument_name.description: Name of the argument of the workflow.
___workflow_argument_name.title: Name

___to_be_unzippped.description: unzip program if the file must be unzipped before workflow run
___to_be_unzippped.title: to_be_unzipped

___qc_table.description: Name of QC file if in a tab-delimited text format, either as it is or in the zipped file
___qc_table.title: QC table

___qc_type.description: QC object type inherited from quality_metric to be used to represent QC
___qc_type.title: QC Type

___description.description: A short text description of the workflow.
___description.title: Description

___wdl_option_filename.description: Name of the option file for the WDL workflow
___wdl_option_filename.title: WDL option file name

___cwl_directory_url.description: URL of the directory that contains main and other CWL files needed for the workflow
___cwl_directory_url.title: CWL directory url

___previous_version.description: Link to the previous versions of the workflow.
___previous_version.title: Previous versions

items.description: Link to a previous version of the workflow.
items.title: Previous version

___wdl_main_filename.description: Name of the main WDL file for the workflow
___wdl_main_filename.title: WDL main file name

___docker_registry_url.description: Docker Hub or 7 bridges registry URL.
___docker_registry_url.title: Docker Registry URL

___cwl_directory_url_draft3.description: URL of the directory that contains main and other CWL files needed for the workflow
___cwl_directory_url_draft3.title: CWL directory url for CWL draft3

___cwl_pointer.description: Path to the SBG CWL file for the workflow - URL or directory path
___cwl_pointer.title: SBG CWL Path

___name.description: Unique name (or other identifier) of step within this Workflow.
___name.title: Step Name

___target.description: Where this output file should go next.
___target.title: Target Step

___meta.description: Additional info that might be relavent to the output argument itself, such as argument_cardinality.
___meta.title: Additional metadata for output argument

___meta.description: Additional info that might be relavent to the input argument itself, such as argument_cardinality.
___meta.title: Additional metadata for input argument

___source.description: Where this input file came from.
___source.title: Source Step

___meta.description: Various properties which might be a subset of the Item represented by this step, e.g. uuid, @type, workflow, etc.
___meta.title: Step Metadata

___software_used.description: List of References to Software Used
___software_used.title: Software Used

___analysis_step_types.description: List of step purposes which may be shown above the Node in Workflow graphs.
___analysis_step_types.title: Step Purposes

___@id.title: Unique identifier of Item in database represented by this step node. If present, will be loaded in via AJAX upon node click.

___name.description: The name and version of the workflow used by either SBG or Tibanna, in the format of name/version
___name.title: Name

___docker_image_name.description: The name of the image that is downloaded
___docker_image_name.title: Image Name

___app_name.description: The name of the workflow app.
___app_name.title: App name

___experiment_types.description: Types of the experiment that the workflow is applied to.
___experiment_types.title: Experiment types

items.description: type of experiment that the workflow is applied to
items.title: Experiment type

___wdl_child_filenames.description: Names of the other WDL files used by the main WDL file for the workflow
___wdl_child_filenames.title: WDL child file names

___wdl_directory_url.description: URL of the directory that contains main and other WDL files needed for the workflow
___wdl_directory_url.title: WDL directory url

___cwl_directory_url_v1.description: URL of the directory that contains main and other CWL files needed for the workflow
___cwl_directory_url_v1.title: CWL directory url for CWL v1.0

___category.description: A short text description of the workflow's category.
___category.title: Category

___cwl_main_filename.description: Name of the main CWL file for the workflow
___cwl_main_filename.title: CWL main file name
